Title: Extra notifications
Description:
Shows notifications when
- A train has been waiting at a signal for a long time
- A train or truck arrives at a station, has only an unload order there, and was already empty
- More to come later! Leave suggestions in the comments.

Source: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods
Changelog: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods/blob/master/ExtraNotification/changelog.md

Version 0.1.0
